name: XamariniOS
description: Build iOS app with Xamarin on Mac OS
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: solution
inputs.label: Solution
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root of the Xamarin.iOS solution to build.

inputs.name: mdtoolLocation

inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the path to mdtool, the Xamarin Studio build tool. If empty, the default will be used: /Applications/Xamarin Studio.app/Contents/MacOS/mdtool
